dialogues.text: Don't deny it, Lloyd. Fraida told me the whole sordid story. Lloyd can't muster a defense. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look... I was gonna tell you about that. It was gonna be mentioned at the reading of my will. I swear, you can ask my lawyer. Harry glares at him. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I guess we both learned a little something about each other, didn't we? LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said it, pal. Maybe we're not as good friends as we thought we were.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess not. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, if one beautiful girl   could rip us apart like this, then   it seems our friendship isn't worth a   damn. (beat) Maybe we should call it quits   right here. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just tell me where to sign, bud. Suddenly they hear the metallic CLICK-CLACK OF A GUN BEIN COCKED. ANDRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, which one of you losers wants to die first? The guys exchange a look and SWALLOW HARD. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't pull that trigger if I were you. ANDRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? It'll look like just another Aspen love triangle. You caught the two of them in bed, handcuffed them to the post, murdered them, and killed yourself. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smug) Except you're forgetting one minor etail. ANDRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that? Lloyd and Mary look at Harry, hopeful. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you kill us, you'd be killing yourself. ANDRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (puzzled) Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, philosophers believe that we're all really just tiny pieces of one huge universal being. In other words, I am you and you are me, so if you were to kill us you'd be committing suicide, you unenlightened idiot -- ANDRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Shut up! Mary sees that they're in deep shit now. MARY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about my husband? Did you kill him, too? HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Husband? What husband? LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mary's married, Harry. ANDRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No need to worry about Melvin. (beat) Now this is the last time I'll ask: Who wants to die first? Harry gestures with his head at Mary. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill her. The bitch should've told him she was married back at the airport. It would've saved us a lot of trouble. Andre points the gun at Mary. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'll go first, Harry. I was the one who got you into this mess. Andre points the gun at Lloyd. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, wait, do me first. I'm the one who stole your girl, Lloyd. I eserve it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andre SIGHS and points the gun at Harry. Then, as Mary an Lloyd look on in horror, he FIRES TWICE. Harry grabs his stomach and falls off the bed to the floor. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ! You killed my best friend, you bastard! Andre smiles. ANDRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it's any consolation, you're about to be reunited. He aims the gun at Lloyd, COCKS THE TRIGGER. Suddenly, a SHOT RINGS OUT and the gun is blown out of Andre's hand. ON THE FLOOR - Harry is very much alive and pointing a pi at the stunned Nicholas Andre. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry! You're alive! Just them, the door BURSTS OPEN and SEVERAL POLICE OFFICE storm in with their weapons drawn. COP #1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get your hands up, asshole! Lloyd and Harry throw their hands into the air. A stunned Andre turns to see six guns pointing at his head. He reluctantly raises his hands. Mary and Lloyd are flabberg by the turn of events. There's a sudden commotion in the room. Pushing her way through the mass of cops comes the Athletic Beauty. She flashes an ID. ATHLETIC BEAUTY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Special Officer Kathryn Frick. Federal Bureau of Investigation. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dumbstruck) You gotta be kidding. ATHLETIC BEAUTY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good work, Harry. Lloyd looks to his friend, confused. Harry opens his shir revealing a BULLET-PROOF VEST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabbed me down in the lobby and explained what was up. They slapped this on me and gave me a gun. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Athletic Beauty) But how did you...? ATHLETIC   BEAUTY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've been following   you two all the way from Providence.   Mr. and Mrs. Swanson had a homing   device plated in the briefcase. The guys glance guiltily at one another. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, about that dough... ATHLETIC BEAUTY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every bill was counterfeit and marked. Harry and Lloyd EXHALE A SIGH OF RELIEF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a swarm of ONLOOKERS as Andre and J.P. Shay are hustled into a police car and driven away. While Mary TAL to the police, Harry and Lloyd stare at her lovingly. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's something, ain't she, Har? HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were right, Lloyd. She was efinitely worth the trip. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess we have to admit it, she was too good for us. Just then, a cruiser pulls up and Mary's husband jumps ou MELVIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh god, baby, I missed you! Harry and Lloyd stare in wonder as MEL GIBSON climbs out the car. Mary and Mel embrace, then Mel turns to the guys

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MELVIN (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't thank you enough, fellas. It was so darn dank in that well, I really thought it would be the death of me. Harry and Lloyd are too stunned to respond. They look at each other, and we

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lloyd and Harry come out of the elevator with their meage luggage, but this time nobody rushes to their aid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guys EXIT the hotel and approach the Bell Captain, Barnard. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Barney... BELL CAPTAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, gentlemen? LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, we just wanted to say that we appreciate all you did for us during our stay. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we're, um, sorry about the money we gave you turning out to be phony. BELL CAPTAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about it, gentlemen. The Swanson family has promised to reimburse everyone. This seems to please Lloyd and Harry. The hearse is deliv to the front door. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, anyway, thanks again for everything. They turn to go, but Barnard CALLS TO THEM: BARNARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you two headed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dunno. I'm sure we'll find a trailer camp somewhere to call home. BARNARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not right here? Harry and Lloyd look at each other, confused. LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This joint is a little out of our budget, Barney. BARNARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling) Oh, I think we might be able to find you a free room somewhere -- after all, like you once told me, we're all from the same mold. (winks) You just don't have any dough right now. The guys are STUNNED by Barnard's generous offer. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you on the level? BARNARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Absolutely. We'll just slide you into one of the employee rooms... The guys beam at this. BARNARD (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Provided, of course, you don't mind working one or two afternoons a week. Harry and Lloyd lock eyes. Then: LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what, Barney, I think we'll take out chances down the road. Barnard shakes his head as the two fools climb into their hearse and drive off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the hearse drives down the road, we hear V.O.:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (v.o.) Since we're finished elbow-rubbing, what next, lloyd? LLOYD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (v.o.) I say we head due south and try a little nose-rubbing with some of them slinky eskimo babes. HARRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (v.o.) Now you're talking my language. You know I got a weakness for blondes. As they head toward their next adventure, the CAMERA PULL UP, UP, UP...
